title: Setting the scene designer interviews: Stephen Curtis

abstract: Interview with production designer Stephen Curtis on his work for ACMI's Setting the Scene exhibition.
description: A co-production between AFTRS and ACMI for ACMI's Setting the Scene exhibition. Stephen Curtis talks about his approach to production designing on his work on Bedevil and Night Cries. This was used as part of the Landscape Spaces section of the exhibition.
